column4: anyone have a clue as to what mys issue is with automounting a 1TB usb drive in 9.04?
so when you plug it in, do you see it in dmesg?
I am seeing weird stuff in the File Browser under "Computer" the "/" partition is showing up twice as "75.5 GB Media" and I also see it again as "File System"
I know. But it does not
do you have any other usb mass storage devices you have tested?
yes, 2 500GB. They mount fine. Same filesystem. NTFS.
so if it's the size of the volume, you might try to see that by creating a smaller partition, but my guess is you already have data on the drive
were any of the other disks GPT?
I am sooooo sorry. I just figured it out. There is no partition on /dev/sdb . Just data. I did it wrong.  :o(
nevermind. I was checking the wrong drive. I do have a correct partition. The device is /dev/sdc1
well my guess is that gpt is the issue, but i can't really be sure
I agree. Well thank you for the help. I will just mount the damn thing in /etc/fstab .
